data.name: TOSS!
data.description:
IT'S TIME TO GO BANANAS! 

Swing and toss yourself freely across spacey jungle-gym playgrounds as an acrobatic monkey in this bananas VR platformer.
 
You've crash landed on a cloud planet and will need to collect parts to repair your ship by launching yourself around 75+ playground levels in 9 vibrant cloudscape biomes and rank-up to become a TOSS! Master.

This is the VR game that uniquely captures the agility, timing, and gamer skill required to play the beloved platformer classics.

Features:
â€¢ Parkour Action: Soar and launch yourself through the air. Grab hold of trees, pipes, and walls.
â€¢ Challenges: Try to race against the clock with Time Attack, collect all bananas, or use as few grabs as possible in each round.
â€¢ Multiplayer: Dare the obstacle courses together with up to 4 other players. 
â€¢ Social Competition: Compete against other players, and follow your friends' ghosts on the leaderboards.
â€¢ Mastery & Modifiers: Unlock modifiers like Zero Gravity and Double Toss by becoming a TOSS! Master!

Â¡Aterrizaste en un planeta nebuloso y ahora deberÃ¡s reunir bananas para llenar el tanque de tu nave mientras te lanzas a travÃ©s de 75 pistas de obstÃ¡culos y 9 vibrantes biomas de nubes para subir de nivel y volverte una estrella de TOSS!ğŸŒ!

Este es un juego de RV que captura la agilidad, precisiÃ³n y habilidades necesarias para jugar a los mejores clÃ¡sicos de plataformas.

Incluye:
â€¢ Experiencia parkour: LÃ¡nzate por los cielos y sujÃ©tate de Ã¡rboles, barras y paredes.
â€¢ DesafÃ­os: Vence al reloj en los retos de tiempo, encuentra todas las bananas que puedas y supera los niveles con la menor cantidad de agarres posibles.
â€¢ Competencia: Compite contra los demÃ¡s en tiempo y rango, y aprende de tus amigos con los fantasmas del tablero.
â€¢ Domina los potenciadores: Â¡Desbloquea potenciadores, como el cambio de gravedad y el control del aire, para convertirte en una estrella de TOSS!ğŸŒ!

VOUS AVEZ LA BANANE ? Dans ce jeu de plateformes en rÃ©alitÃ© virtuelle, incarnez un singe acrobate, balancez-vous et projetez-vous en toute libertÃ© dans ces vastes aires de jeu.
 
AprÃ¨s avoir atterri en catastrophe sur une planÃ¨te faite de nuages, rÃ©cupÃ©rez des bananes pour alimenter votre vaisseau en vous balanÃ§ant dans les 75 niveaux que comprennent les 9 biomes dynamiques dans un paysage nÃ©buleux, et amÃ©liorez votre classement pour devenir un vÃ©ritable maÃ®tre de TOSS!ğŸŒ.

Ce jeu en rÃ©alitÃ© virtuelle retranscrit de faÃ§on unique lâ€™agilitÃ©, le timing et les compÃ©tences de gamer requises pour maÃ®triser les classiques du jeu de plateformes.

CaractÃ©ristiques :
â€¢ Du parkour : Envolez-vous et propulsez-vous dans les airs, accrochez-vous aux arbres, aux tuyaux et aux murs.
â€¢ Des dÃ©fis : Terminez les parcours le plus vite possible avec le Contre-la-montre trouvez autant de bananes que possible ou accrochez-vous le moins possible Ã  chaque manche.
â€¢ Affrontez vos amis : Tentez dâ€™avoir un meilleur temps et classement quâ€™eux, qui sont reprÃ©sentÃ©s par des fantÃ´mes.
â€¢ De la maÃ®trise et des modificateurs : DÃ©bloquez des modificateurs comme la gravitÃ© zÃ©ro ou encore les commandes de vol en devenant un maÃ®tre de TOSS!ğŸŒ !

translations.long_description:
Ãˆ TEMPO DI BANANARE! In questo gioco platform per VR potrai dondolarti e saltare liberamente da presa a presa, rivestendo i panni di una scimmia acrobatica. 
 
La tua aeronave Ã¨ caduta su un pianeta di nuvole e per ricaricare il carburante dovrai raccogliere le banane attraverso 75 livelli di gioco in ben 9 vibranti biomi atmosferici. Rimboccati i polsini e diventa una leggenda di TOSS!ğŸŒ.

Questo Ã¨ un gioco per VR dove l'agilitÃ , il tempismo e le abilitÃ  del giocatore necessari per affrontare i classici platform sono i veri protagonisti. 

Caratteristiche:
â€¢ Azioni da parkour: lanciati e libra in aria, aggrappati ad alberi, tubi e muri.
 â€¢ Sfide: metti alla prova la tua velocitÃ  nelle corse contro il tempo; trova quante piÃ¹ banane possibili o concludi i round con quante meno prese possibili. 
 â€¢ Competizioni tra giocatori: competi con gli altri per il tempo e il posizionamento in classifica e segui i fantasmi della classifica dei tuoi amici.
 â€¢ AbilitÃ  e modificatori: sblocca i modificatori come il cambio di gravitÃ  o i controlli di volo e diventa una leggenda di TOSS!ğŸŒ!
translations.short_description: Ãˆ TEMPO DI BANANARE! In questo gioco platform per VR potrai dondolarti e saltare liberamente da presa a presa, rivestendo i panni di una scimmia acrobatica. La tua agilitÃ , tempismo e abilitÃ  con il visore saranno le tue armi in questa avventura bananosa!

translations.long_description:
ES IST ZEIT, AM RAD ZU DREHEN! Schwinge und schleudere dich in diesem abgedrehten VR-Plattformer als akrobatischer Affe durch groÃŸe KlettergerÃ¼stspielplÃ¤tze.
 
Du bist auf einem Wolkenplaneten abgestÃ¼rzt und musst Bananen sammeln, um dein Schiff wieder mit Treibstoff zu versorgen, wÃ¤hrend du dich in insgesamt 9 Wolkenlandschaften durch 75 Level schleuderst. ErhÃ¶he deinen Rang und werde zu einem TOSS!ğŸŒ-Meister!

Dies ist ein VR-Spiel, das die Beweglichkeit, das Timing und das SpielerkÃ¶nnen einfÃ¤ngt, die man fÃ¼r geliebte Plattformer-Klassiker gebraucht hat.

Features:
â€¢ Parkour-Action: Schleudere dich selbst durch die Luft und greife nach BÃ¤umen, Rohren oder WÃ¤nden.
â€¢ Herausforderungen: Stelle dich in Zeitmissionen einem Rennen gegen die Uhr und finde so viele Bananen wie mÃ¶glich oder versuche, in jeder Runde so wenig Griffe wie mÃ¶glich zu verwenden.
â€¢ Sozialer Wettbewerb: Tritt je nach Zeit oder Rang gegen andere Spieler an und folge den Bestenlistengeistern deiner Freunde.
â€¢ Meisterschaft und Modifikatoren freischalten: Schalte Modifikatoren wie Gravitationsumkehrung und Flugsteuerung frei, indem du zu einem TOSS!ğŸŒ-Meister wirst!
translations.short_description: ES IST ZEIT, AM RAD ZU DREHEN! Schwinge und schleudere dich in diesem abgedrehten VR-Plattformer als akrobatischer Affe durch groÃŸe KlettergerÃ¼stspielplÃ¤tze. Deine Beweglichkeit, dein Timing und dein KÃ¶nnen als VR-Gamer werden in diesem Spiel einem spaÃŸigen Test unterzogen! Absolut Banane!

changelog.change_log:
- Multiplayer(!!!): Play TOSS!ğŸŒ with old and new friends
- 2 Multiplayer Game Modes: â€˜PARTY PLAYâ€™ & â€˜FREE PLAYâ€™
- Added toggleable global voice chat for Multiplayer 
- B-Sides: 3 hidden areas adding 15 new and challenging levels influenced by modifiers. Find them, dare them, overcome them!
- Added new cuff rewards for completing B-Sides
- Extended leaderboard ghost recording time: Game will now also record those of you that tend to enjoy the vista on your way to smash the button.
- Updated UI to include features Multiplayer and B-Sides
- Playground: A free-roaming area where you, alone or with your party can climb, play and explore the tossing system freely.
- Added teleporter to Playground in Landing
- Fixed crash that could occur when restarting level when falling
- Improved performance related to trampoline bouncer
- Improved performance related to fully assembled space ship
- Fixed bug where sound from Double Toss modifier could be heard when disabled
- Added sound to when Go Beyond is achieved on a level

- Fixed issue of Leaderboard time not always showing when completing level for the first time
- Fixed issue of Leaderboards showing wrong entries sometimes
- Fixed objects with wrong material & being misplaced in a handful of levels
- Fixed bug where Modifiers are still enabled to exploit game features
- Added Extra Height option for seated players (found in settings)
- Leaderboard names can now be up to 18 characters long
- Leaderboard view now display error message if no internet
- Adjusted text field for ranks on leaderboard to fit larger numbers
- Updated Chinese localization
- Minor changes to VFXs for readability
- Fixed bug that could cause the game to crash while in credits
- Switched buttons to open menu to avoid misclick
- N.A.N.A tossing tutorial in Horizon Heights
- Small visual update to N.A.N.A
